description.narrative: The project aims at reducing the national HCFC consumption by at least 47.76 ODP tonnes by 2025, in order to meet the 2020 and 2025 control targets for HCFCs phase-out.

activity-description.narrative: Beirut - Location of the Ministry of Environment who is the direct beneficiary of the project

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: Volume (tons) of Ozone Depleting substances released

comment.narrative:
Projects: -Update the ODS data base for HCFCs and HFCs users (Manufacturers), imports and consumption in the country: -Monitoring the completed conversion projects of the foam sandwich panels manufacturers and Air conditioning manufacturers and the solar and electric water heaters; - The phase-out of around 62.6 % of the aggregate HCFCs baseline (approximately 46 ODP Tons) by end of 2022; - Launching the training and technical assistance programme addressed to RAC servicing sector: 5 trainings planned for 2022 for grad students & technicians - Provision of technical assistance on HFCs alternative technologies to RAC manufacturers and user in the country
Awareness - Conceptualize and produce short videos, showcasing the renovation of the new Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Centers and the positive economic impact of the conversion of some industries to become Ozone-friendly.
